title: Sudden FPS Drops
body: Normally I play with over 200fps, have a quad-core i7 processor with a 660ti graphics. Very good and can handle most graphic intensive games with ease. However league of all games is giving me trouble, getting a solid 30fps now with spikes below 20 sometimes, can anyone help? I've updated drivers and reinstalled the client.

replies.body: Your PC might be too good!  What happens if you put a cap on your FPS in-game?  Usually that will resolve the issue on[ higher end PCs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs).  Otherwise, try the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for additional steps beyond a repair or drivers.  I hope that helps!
